评论用户: This wagon is fantastic. I was so satisfied with the first one I purchased that I bought a second one exactly the same color and size as the first one.  I use them in my storage room at my house to keep lawn furniture cushions and other small items that I store away in winter. When summer rolls around, it’s so easy to roll the wagon outside and put all the cushions and other things in the yard at once. I will also use it for the beach and picnics. It was fully assembled when it arrived and all I had to do was take it out of the box and stretch the wagon open.
